alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 2:19PM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Culberson County, the Davis Mountains,and Davis Mountains Foothills. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County
